title: Suvarnamala Diamond-Accented Gold Bangle
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds (VS clarity
features: This bangle showcases a contemporary zigzag pattern, reminiscent of a modern Vanki design. Each crest holds a sparkling diamond, securely set in a prong setting for maximum brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's natural luster, creating a rich and enduring finish. The seamless design ensures a comfortable fit.
colors: Luminous Yellow Gold contrasted with the icy white of the Diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Suitable for modern celebrations and complements traditional South Indian attire perfectly
making it a stunning choice for events like Diwali or Sankranthi.
description: This Suvarnamala bangle seamlessly blends tradition and modernity. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting brilliance and the high-quality diamonds add a touch of luxury. The contemporary design makes it versatile, pairing beautifully with both traditional and Western outfits. Its lightweight construction makes it comfortable for all-day wear.
